Powers.DescShort: Toggle: PBAoE, Minor DMG(Negative), Foe  -To Hit
Powers.DescLong: Dark Servant channels Negative Energy to reduce the chance to hit of all nearby foes while slowly dealing damage.
While active, the Dark Servant channels Negative Energy onto a targeted foe. Darkest Night decreases the damage potential of the target, and all foes near the target, as long as the power is active.
Dark Servant is resistant to Negative Energy but Vulnerable to Energy.

The Dark Servant channels Negative Energy through itself to a targeted foe. Twilight Grasp drains the power from that target and slowly transfers it to you and your nearby allies. The targeted foe's chance to hit and damage is reduced, while you and your allies are healed.

Powers.DescShort: Ranged (Cone), Medium DMG(Negative/Smash), Foe Immobilize, -To Hit
Powers.DescLong: This cone blast envelops all foes in oily tentacles. Affected foes are slowly drained of life while the tentacles Immobilize them and reduce their chance to hit.
Petrifies a single targeted foe with a terrifying gaze. The victim is Held and defenseless. Recharge: Slow
